section.title: General information pages
section.paragraph: Understanding collections will outline how groups of items are stored in CellML, and how you can manipulate them.
Understanding units will explain the difference between the four types of Units in CellML, and how to create them using libCellML.
Constants vs variables will help you understand the different ways in which Variable elements are assigned value, and what each means to your whole modelâ€™s interpretation.
Understanding the Analyser explains in more detail how the Analyser class operates, and common issues you may encounter.
